title: Is the Rapture coming on September 23? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/29/17
itunes:title: Is the Rapture coming on September 23? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/29/17
description:
George Noory and biblical scholar L.A. Marzulli discuss the theory that the rapture will happen on September 23 and whether or not the massive destruction caused by Hurricane Harvey is a sign of the End Times.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
